name: Magic Garden
description:
In this garden, all kinds of beautiful plants bloom their flowers. However, these plants also need to protect themselves from invasion, or they will be predated by the invaders.



In order to protect the garden plants, you need to play a plant guard and use various plants to resist the invasion of insects. You can choose to grow different kinds of plants, each with its own special skills and attacks.



However, intruders will not sit still, and they will use various methods to attack garden plants. You need to be vigilant at all times, use your wits and strategy to let the plants defeat the invaders and protect the tranquility of the garden.

By constantly building strategies and gradually upgrading the prosperous garden, you can decide how to resist incoming enemies. Race against time to defend your own and others' gardens and show your courage and wit!
